data.eml:eml: A basal phylogenetic placement for the salticid spider Eupoa, with descriptions of two new species (Araneae: Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maddison, Wayne P., Bodner, Melissa R. (2007): A basal phylogenetic placement for the salticid spider Eupoa, with descriptions of two new species (Araneae: Salticidae). Zootaxa 1432: 23-33, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175829
